card.name: Überdragon Bajula
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has Dragon in its race. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts those cards into his graveyard. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Scheming Hands
card.text: ■ Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Your opponent discards that card.

card.name: Comet Missile
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker" and power 6000 or less.

card.name: Petrova, Channeler of Suns
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a race other than Mecha Del Sol. Each creature of that race gets +4000 power. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he Unchoosable

card.name: Trixo, Wicked Doll
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature is attacking your opponent and isn't blocked, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Zombie Carnival
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a race. Return up to 3 creatures of that race from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Relentless Blitz
card.text: ■ Choose a race. This turn, each creature of that race can attack untapped creatures and can't be blocked while attacking a creature.

card.name: Cavern Raider
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature is attacking your opponent and isn't blocked, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Gonta, the Warrior Savage
card.text: ■ Multi

card.name: Galek, the Shadow Warrior
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker." Then your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

card.name: Pala Olesis, Morning Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ During your opponent's turn, each of your other creatures gets +2000 power. ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Crystal Spinslicer
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Liquid People.

card.name: Upheaval
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Each player puts all the cards from his mana zone into his hand and, at the same time, puts all the cards from his hand into his mana zone tapped.

card.name: Explosive Trooper Zalmez
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has 2 or fewer shields, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

card.name: Mykee's Pliers
card.text: ■ Each of your darkness creatures and nature creatures in the battle zone has "speed attacker." ''(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Tajimal, Vizier of Aqua
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Multi ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ While battling a fire creature, this creature gets +4000 power.

card.name: Hide and Seek
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in the battle zone and return it to his hand. Then he discards a card at random from his hand.

card.name: Hearty Cap'n Polligon
card.text: ■ End Step

card.name: Emergency Typhoon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Draw up to 2 cards. Then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: Lucky Ball
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has 3 or fewer shields, draw up to 2 cards.

card.name: Ten-Ton Crunch
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

card.name: Cosmic Darts
card.text: ■ Your opponent chooses one of your shields. Look at it. If it's a spell, you may cast it immediately For No Cost

card.name: Pincer Scarab
card.text: ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each card in your opponent's hand. ■ While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "double breaker'' (This creature breaks 2 shields)''."

card.name: Valkyer, Starstorm Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Wily Carpenter
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 2 cards. Then discard 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: Spiritual Star Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a creature that evolution creature

card.name: Fortification Against Barrage and Ambush
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature. Destroy all creatures that have less power than that creature. Put all revealed cards into your graveyard.

card.name: Zereem Crawler
card.text: ■ This creature can attack untapped fire creatures. ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Funeral Song of the Beasts
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +4000 power and "Whenever this creature is attacking your opponent and becomes blocked, it breaks one of your opponent's shields" until the End Step

card.name: Melcap, the Mutant Explorer
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: Pulpy Goobie
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck. Then put them back in any order. ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Necrodragon Zanjibar
card.text: ■ Each of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone gets -2000 power. ''(A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)''

card.name: Cloud Mayfly
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are nature cards, this creature gets +4000 power, "Double breaker", and can't be blocked by creatures that have power 5000 or less.

card.name: Helios Tiga Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less. If you have a tooltip ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Over Skill, Rampaging Machine
card.text: ■ At the start of each player's turn, that player draws an extra card. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they Unchoosable

card.name: Zack Pichi, Winged Dragon Admiral
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Armored Dragons and Fire Birds from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If all the revealed cards were Dragons, this creature gets "speed attacker" until the End Step ■ When this creature would be discarded during your opponent's turn, you may put it instead.

card.name: Mint Shuval, Oracle Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Thrilling Three

card.name: Galzark, Divine Destruction Dragon Knight
card.text: ■ Multi ■ While you have at least one other Dragon in the battle zone, this creature gets "Power attacker +6000" and "Triple breaker". ■ Double Breaker ■ This creature can't be attacked.

card.name: Banjo, the Super-energetic
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Dreammate from your deck, show that Dreammate to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
